alert.note: Alert for Abbeville; Anderson; Laurens; Southern Greenville (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 12 at 3:31PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT WEST CENTRAL LAURENS...SOUTH CENTRAL GREENVILLE...CENTRAL ANDERSON AND NORTH CENTRAL ABBEVILLE COUNTIES THROUGH 415 PM EDT... At 331 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles east of Anderson, or over Belton, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Anderson, Homeland Park, Belton, Williamston, Northlake, Honea Path, Iva, West Pelzer, Starr, and Anderson Airport. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
